text:
The javascript code in menu.js is very ancient and very buggy, which crashes ff
and other mozilla based browsers on linux. i have updated the menu.js code to be
well-written and tested on ff (win), ie (win) and ff(linux).
creator: gregor@apache.org

text: this has been fixed for 1.2. 1.4 already has the newer code.
